CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 13, 1954, pg. 11, reads: "Silver Year - Mr. and Mrs. William R. Lowry (above) celebrated their silver wedding anniversary, Feb. 26, at their home, 1231 Franklin Street, North Side. Attending the affair were their ten sons and daughters, nine grandchildren, six sisters and three brothers of Mr. Lowry and others in immediate family.  Close friends, too, were in attendance.  A buffet supper was served. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Vivian Lowry holding dish, and William Lowry wearing diamond patterned tie, celebrating their twenty-fifth wedding anniversary, surrounded by group including Dolores Lowry on left,  Helen Lowry Alston second from right, Ella Mae "Auggie" Lowry Strothers standing on right, and Marlene Lowry seated on right, in their home at 1231 Franklin Street, Northside
